content: Just got back from Walmart and what I saw is disgusting. I was standing by the frozen food counter and a Mexican spit a goober on the floor not 20 feet from me. I responded without thinking and said, “You filthy son-of-a-*****”. He glared at me but said nothing and walked away. I was ready to hit him beside the head with anything I could get my hands on if he said anything or started trouble. I showed Sharon where he spit (beside the food) and said it makes me want to put everything back and leave. I’ve seen people spit on sidewalks outside but never in the store and especially in the food section. Still makes my skin crawl.
reply: Just got back from Walmart and what I saw is disgusting. I was standing by the frozen food counter and a Mexican spit a goober on the floor not 20 feet from me. I responded without thinking and said, “You filthy son-of-a-*****”. He glared at me but said nothing and walked away. I was ready to hit him beside the head with anything I could get my hands on if he said anything or started trouble. I showed Sharon where he spit (beside the food) and said it makes me want to put everything back and leave. I’ve seen people spit on sidewalks outside but never in the store and especially in the food section. Still makes my skin crawl.
title: Disgusting

content: Walmart use to be good place to shop when Sam Walton was alive. But after he died the the stores were changed into cess pits for goods from third world countries. Is this legal? I don't know,but its fun isn't?!

title: Disgusting

content: It is all so disrespectful. I can't believe how some people act in public. I see people throw things out of their car all the time and it makes me sick. I wish I could give them a ticket. I think the only way to stop people from doing things like that is to make them have to deal with the after math. Like the person in the store should have had to clean the floor, the person throwing things out of the car should have to pick up trash on the side of the road, the person who does not pick up after their pet should have to pick up poo etc Oh, and did anyone get the email about Target? It said that Target is a French owned company and does not support the military. Is that true? They said it did not meet their charitable deeds. If that is true it offends me and I am not shopping there. We have to wake up and only support American business right now. We have to be informed and active in keeping the money and the jobs here don't you think?
reply: It is all so disrespectful. I can't believe how some people act in public. I see people throw things out of their car all the time and it makes me sick. I wish I could give them a ticket. content: Target gives a lot of money away to the community too, they always have. There are several people I know who work for places that benefit from targets charitable contributions. I don't think Walmart is so charitable anymore. I could be wrong.

content: Target gives a lot of money away to the community too, they always have. There are several people I know who work for places that benefit from targets charitable contributions. There are a lot of rumours and urban legends out there, most don't make any sense, but my mil keeps sending me so much false information because she received via email. I don't think Walmart is so charitable anymore. I could be wrong.
